topic_metadata.title: How to use #pause with columns in Touying?

posts.name: Bo Johnson
posts.cooked: Is there currently a way to have 2+ columns on a Touying slide and have #pause be column dependent? Currently having 2 columns, using #pause on one side will push everything on the other side to a new slide. I’d like to have #pause work on only one column, for example on a slide with text on one side and a figure on the other and using #pause on the text but not affecting the figure.
posts.raw: Is there currently a way to have 2+ columns on a Touying slide and have `#pause` be column dependent? Currently having 2 columns, using `#pause` on one side will push everything on the other side to a new slide. I'd like to have `#pause` work on only one column, for example on a slide with text on one side and a figure on the other and using `#pause` on the text but not affecting the figure.

posts.name: OrangeX4
posts.cooked:
Add #meanwhile at the beginning of the second column, for example

#slide[
  one #pause two
][
  #meanwhile
  image
]
posts.raw:
Add `#meanwhile` at the beginning of the second column, for example

```typ
#slide[
  one #pause two
][
  #meanwhile
  image
]
```
